p.d: : A change of air Valérie has taken a stupid decision and daren't tell anyone. Tired of seeing her daughter in front of the TV all day and night, Madeleine locks her out for an hour. But Valérie disappears. Directed by: Stéphane Lapointe (season 1, Canada, 2016) Screenplay: Isabelle Langlois Cast: Sophie Cadieux (Valérie), Antoine Archambault (Thomas), Sylvie Léonard (Madeleine), Simon Lacroix (Éric), Éric Paulhus (Kevin), Éric Bernier (Stéphane), Jean-MoIse Martin (Simon), Olivia Palacci (Genevieve), Christine Beaulieu (Josiane) Genre: comedy drama
